pcie_board_t Board [NUM_BOARDS]

Detailed Description

The main container of all the data structures and elements that comprise the lscdma device driver. Main elements are the array of detected eval boards, the sysfs class, the assigned driver number.

Definition at line 294 of file lscdma.h.
